questions.question2Part1.1: Do you prefer studying in the morning or evening?

questions.question3Part1.1: Do you prefer group study or individual study?

questions.question1Part1.2: Describe what you see in these two pictures.

questions.question2Part1.2: How do the two settings represent different ways of life?

questions.question3Part1.2: In which environment do you think people are happier, and why?

questions.question1Part2: Tell me about a sports event you watched.
How did it change your perspective on teamwork?
Why do sports events bring people together??

questions.statement: The Voting Age Should Be Lowered to 16.

For.fact1: Encourages political engagement at a young age.
For.fact2: 16-year-olds are mature enough to make informed decisions.
For.fact3: It reflects the age at which many take on adult responsibilities.

Against.fact2: They may be easily influenced by others.
Against.fact3: Voting should remain a responsibility for adults.
